name: Broken Record (HardCodeBoys)
description:
It’s a rainy day outside so you decided to stay home, make yourself a nice cup of hot tea and relax to some music by the old dusty gramophone. It’s kind of worn down from all the years, so take good care of it, get cozy in your armchair, play some tunes. Just don’t hit the wrong notes, okay ?

I've made this game for the Brackeys Jam 2020.2 and it's the first game I've ever created so any and all feedback is greatly appreciated. 

First greatly appreciated feedback is that I messed up the WebGL build settings so it has to be played in fullscreen and I have no idea how it will look on other resolutions. Have fun though !
